docs.lead_paragraph: The regulations, which will start to take effect next summer, require food processing companies to reduce risks instead of acting only after someone gets sick.

headline.main: U.S. Makes Final an Array of Rules on Food Safety
headline.print_headline: U.S. Makes Final an Array of Rules on Food Safety

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration finalizes rules meant to prevent food-borne illness in United States from contaminated products, including produce; 48 million Americans a year get sick from food-borne diseases and 3,000 die.
docs.snippet: The regulations, which will start to take effect next summer, require food processing companies to reduce risks instead of acting only after someone gets sick.
